explains: n. 推荐；任命，指定；被提名的人（或物）

sentences.en: They opposed her nomination to the post of Deputy Director.
sentences.cn: 他们反对任命她为副主任。

sentences.en: He quickly won his party's nomination to contest the elections.
sentences.cn: 他迅速赢得了其党派的提名来参加竞选。

sentences.en: He won the nomination as Democratic candidate for the presidency.
sentences.cn: 他赢得了民主党总统候选人的提名。
